O

onAddAssociatedPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddProductController
This method adds the selected part from the top parts table into the bottom associated parts table.
It adds the parts added into the associatedPartsTable into the productAssociatedParts array list which then will later be added into the Product AssociatedParts array list.
onAddPartSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddPartController
This method retrieves the data from all text fields and initializes string variables with this data.
These string variables are parsed into Integers and placed into the integer version of the original string variables.
This method checks to make sure all text fields are not null and if they are, an error message is displayed.
This method uses two different main if statements that check which radio button is selected and change which label to display and which subclass to place the part object in and adds the part into the allParts array list.
The method checks to make sure numerical text fields do not contain a string value and if they do, an error message is displayed.
Returns the user to the main form page after the save button is pressed.

RUNTIME ERROR
An incompatible type error was occurring once addPart was being saved if the InHouse radiobutton was selected.
I was trying to pass the string variable of selectedTextS into the new Inhouse I object.
That object is expecting an integer value for machineId, so I parsed the string variable selectedTextS to an integer variable selectedTxt.
onCancelToMain(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddPartController
This method confirms with the user before returning the user to the main form if the Cancel button is clicked.
onDeletePart(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainFormController
This method grabs the selected part's data and deletes it.
It will confirm with the user before deletion of part as well as displaying an error message if no part is selected or if the part was not deleted.
onInHouse(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddPartController
This method sets the selectedOption label to "Machine ID" if the InHouse radio button is selected.
onInHouse(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyPartController
This method sets the selectedOption label to "Machine ID" if the In-House radio button is selected.
onModifySearchParts(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyProductController
This method is used to search the allParts array list with the value entered into the search text field at the top of the screen.
The method will either return the part matching the id entered, or the part matching the full or partial name given.
If no part is found an error message will be displayed.
onOutsourced(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddPartController
This method sets the selectedOption label to "Company Name" if the Outsourced radio button is selected.
onOutsourced(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyPartController
This method sets the selectedOption label to "Company Name" if the Outsourced radio button is selected.
onProductPartSearch(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddProductController
This method extracts the input data from the search field and calls the lookUpPart method from the Inventory class and searches through the array list for a match and returns the results to the partTable.
If no results are found an error message is displayed saying no results are found.
onProductSearch(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainFormController
This method extracts the input from the search text field and calls the lookUpProduct method from the Inventory class and searches through the array list for a match and returns results to the productTable.
If no results are found an error message is displayed saying no results are found.
Outsourced - Class in Model
This is the Outsourced class that is a subclass of superclass Part.
Outsourced(int, String, double, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class Model.Outsourced
This method is the constructor for Outsourced that extends superclass Part to take in the companyName variable.
outsourcedRadio - Variable in class Controller.AddPartController
 
outsourcedRadio - Variable in class Controller.ModifyPartController
